不攻击，持续恢复范围内所有友军<@ba.kw>生命</>（每秒恢复相当于自身攻击.en: Does not attack but continuously restores the <@ba.kw>HP</> of all allies within range (the HP restored per second is equal to 10% of self ATK). Self is unaffected by <$ba.inspire>Inspiration</>. If there are 2 or more operators in Attack Range, ATK+8%

不阻挡敌人时优先<@ba.kw>远程群体</>物理攻击.en: When not blocking enemies, ASPD +10, prioritizes dealing <@ba.kw>ranged AoE</> Physical damage
